name: Root Links
description:
Root Links

Made for the Global Game Jam 2023 (30 January - 5 February 2023)

Theme: "Roots"

Made with Unity. This is the post-jam version with little improvements. The original entry can be viewed here.

Controls:

- Left Click and drag to create channels.

- Right Click and drag to delete channels. 

- Create connections to nodes to gain energy. 

- Level up to gain more channels to use.

- Don't let a node be unconnected for too long! 

Please enjoy!
